chapter.title: Samples: example tests
chapter.para: The aim of this chapter is to present several tests highlighting some features. The following applications under test (AUTs) will be used:

listitem.para: A simple calculator tool, Adder. This tool is available as a Swing AUT, a JavaFX AUT, an SWT AUT and as a HTML AUT.
A DVD organization tool, DVD Manager. With this Swing tool, film categories can be added and browsed, and DVDâ€™s and various details about each DVD can be entered.

para.para: If you want to use these AUTs to try out your own tests, you can find them under jubula/examples/AUTs.
